error.EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED: This email address is already registered
error.accessDenied: Access denied. You do not have the necessary permissions to perform this action.
error.updateUnchanged: The update request cannot be performed because the user data has not changed.
error.userNotFound: The requested user was not found.
error.userNotVerified: Action forbidden: user is account is not verified.
error.confirmEmailAndLoginAgain: Please confirm your email address, a new email has been sent. Please log in again.
error.incorrectEmailOrPassword: Login error: Incorrect email or password. Please check the spelling and try again.
